command.description: The command that was executed on the system.

files.description: An array of file ids that were included in the command

requestTime.description: The time that the command was sent.

exitCode.description: The stderr output from the command that ran.

output.description: The output of the command that was executed.

error.description: The stderr output from the command that ran.

responseTime.description: The time that the command was completed.

sudo.description: If the user had sudo rights

system.description: The name of the system the command was executed on.

systemId.description: The id of the system the command was executed on.

user.description: The user the command ran as.
